O21Toolbox.UpdateListings.UpdateDef.content:
Version 2.0.0 - Updated to support RimWorld 1.3 and Ideology. - (If VFE-Mechanoids is installed) Mechanoid parts can now be merged to create Mechanoid Components, and the reverse can also be done. Rebalancing them specifically to handle mod interaction there did not go as I'd hoped so this is a compromise.
Right click to dismiss update.
